title: Open Syndrome Confirmed Case of Cholera
description: Laboratory confirmation with positive fecal culture for toxigenic Vibrio cholerae O1 or O139

inclusion_criteria.name: Confirmation by Laboratory with Positive Culture of Stool

values.name: Confirmation by Laboratory with Positive Culture of Stool for Vibrio cholerae O1
Confirmation by Laboratory with Positive Culture of Stool for O139 Toxigenic
